name: Nerag's Adventure
description:
Nerag's Adventure is just a dumb first project; mainly uploading it to show to my existent friends, track progress, and record what I learned.

What I learned - 

Basic Movement of Platformers

Main Menu screen

Poor Animations 

Leveling/Scene Usage

Bugs -

I forgot to Loop / Fix the music (Fixed)

Some collisions were missed.

Comments - 

I hated how I couldn't properly make a death sound due to null and tried so hard but couldn't get it to work. My alternative of putting it at the beginning of each scene broke me, sorry.

I forgot clouds.

My friend is immediate garbage for not making me a simple forest drawing as a BG

So I made my own wonderful graphics and SFX.

There are 2 Easter Eggs I am proud of.

West of slight distortion leads to a red key?

I feel like I haven't learned much in code and have been just cloning what others have been.

Small Update -

Fixed some collisions

Looped Music

Initially wasn't going to do this but my friend sent that forest BG (thanks) and I might as well put use to it.
